pages.text: Here you will learn to craft and imbue jewelry with mystical properties. To begin:$(li)First, imbue some $(#b0b)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/beryl_copper)Beryllium Copper Ingots$()$(li)Next, craft your ingots and an $(#b0b)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst)Amethyst Shard$() into a piece of $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/copper_jewelry)Copper Jewelry$()$(li)This jewelry provides a minor bonus, but isn't capable of containing more potent magics. Imbue your jewelry into $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbued_jewelry)Imbued Jewelry$()

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_mat.text: Obtain $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/beryl_copper_ingot)Beryllium Copper$() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst_shard)Amethyst Shards$() or $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/steel_ingot)Steel$() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:gems/amethyst_shard)Diamonds$()

amethyst_imbuement:progression/basic_jew.text: Craft your first piece of $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/copper_jewelry)Copper$() or $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets)Steel$() Jewelry. These come with minor bonuses on their won, but we can go further.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/reagent.text: Imbued Jewelry is next, it comes with a variety of innate bonuses. Pick your $(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/imbuing_reagents)Reagent$() before imbuing your jewelry.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/augment_g.text: Take the next step and augment your jewelry with an $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/augment_guide)Augment$().
